glsa.title: Gallery: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities in Gallery may lead to execution of arbitrary code, disclosure of local files or theft of user's credentials.

background.p: Gallery is an open source web based photo album organizer.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Gallery 1 and 2:

ul.li: Digital Security Research Group reported a directory traversal vulnerability in contrib/phpBB2/modules.php in Gallery 1, when register_globals is enabled (CVE-2008-3600).
Hanno Boeck reported that Gallery 1 and 2 did not set the secure flag for the session cookie in an HTTPS session (CVE-2008-3662).
Alex Ustinov reported that Gallery 1 and 2 does not properly handle ZIP archives containing symbolic links (CVE-2008-4129).
The vendor reported a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Gallery 2 (CVE-2008-4130).

impact.p: Remote attackers could send specially crafted requests to a server running Gallery, allowing for the execution of arbitrary code when register_globals is enabled, or read arbitrary files via directory traversals otherwise. Attackers could also entice users to visit crafted links allowing for theft of login credentials.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
